roleset.name: not accomplishing some task
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, succeed-v.01.

example.name: arg0
example.text: If i am unsuccessful i 'd get other family members to help and ultimately if they still refuse to listen -- i 'd leave them to their own accord and let them do what they belive is right or wrong .

example.name: both args
example.text: Because I was unsuccessful at taking over the world today ...
